Get your tickets to see Broad Comedy!

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

In these dark times, we all need some light. Do you Dare to Laugh in the face of it all?

Broad Comedy, a snarky, provocative and loveable all-women's comedy troupe is touring the state to benefit the ACLU of Montana. Know nothing about the Broads? Watch their teaser.

The Broads will start their tour in Whitefish on Wednesday, September 25 at the O'Shaughnessy Cultural Arts Center. Then, they will head to Missoula on Friday, September 27 to perform at the Missoula Community Theatre. The tour comes to a close in Bozeman on Saturday, September 28 at the Emerson Center for Arts & Culture.

Dare to Laugh!

This September, Broad Comedy brings their musical satire to benefit the ACLU of Montana.

Wednesday, September 25, 7:30 p.m.
O'Shaughnessy Cultural Arts Center
Whitefish, MT 59937

Friday, September 27, 8 p.m.
MCT Center for the Performing Arts
Missoula, MT 59802

Saturday, September 28, 8 p.m.
Emerson Center for the Arts & Culture
Bozeman, MT 59715

Purchase Tickets

Opening for the Broads is Lenny Peppers, local Montana stand-up comedian slash activist slash awesome human.

Be sure to catch this show where you can. Dare to Laugh with us! Your laughter will support all the work we do, including criminal justice reform, Indigenous justice, educational equity, LGBTQ rights, reproductive freedom, immigrants' rights, and more.

Get your tickets today.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Montana
